channel.title: Artificial?
channel.description:
TUTORIAL - [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html [/url] Hey, i have been trying to make highscores from the tutorial but i get this error...
Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: YES) in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\mysql.php on line 3
Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: YES) in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\mysql.php on line 3
Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: YES) in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\mysql.php on line 3 Overall Hiscores
Warning: mysql_result(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\config.php on line 178 No database selected
any ideas? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2009, 12:58:43 pm[/size][hr]and also, if u dont know the error, do you know how i could make the highscores myself and update the stats myself through character stats?

item.title: Artificial?
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

That isn’t what I asked.

Read full topic

item.title: Artificial?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote=“Envion, post:4, topic:287038”]Table 'highscores.skillsoverall' doesn't exist

That doesn’t tell you anything either? A misnamed table, or an SQL backup you haven’t imported?

Anything?[/quote]i think i ve done everything…ill give you line 178, cause it says thats werre the error is

	[code]$count = mysql_result(mysql_query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM skillsoverall"),0) or die(mysql_error());[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Artificial?
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

Table 'highscores.skillsoverall' doesn't exist

That doesn’t tell you anything either? A misnamed table, or an SQL backup you haven’t imported?

Anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Artificial?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote="_™, post:2, topic:287038"][function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’
and
in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\mysql.php

Doesn’t tell you anything at all, or even where to take your first step?[/quote]i checked it there and it was fine, im not sure why, here this is what it says

[code]

<?php // MYSQL mysql_connect('localhost', 'root', 'MY PASSWORD,AND IT IS CORRECT'); mysql_select_db('highscores'); // CONFIG $ppls_page = "100"; $sig_support = true; $maxhiscorelevel = 99; $sig_image = "metalscape.servegame.com/highscores/images/sig.png"; $top_hiscore = 1000001; $minlvltohiscore = 10; $website = "metalscape.servegame.com/highscores"; $images = "metalscape.servegame.com/highscores/images/"; $file = "index.php"; // ARRAY REMEMBER ALWAYS START WITH MALL LETTER $webbers = array(""); $admins = array("Delta", "Mike"); $mods = array(""); $high_mods = array(""); $donators = array(""); $banned = array(""); // ICONS $webbers_icon = "http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/3287/moddws8.gif"; $admins_icon = "http://i7.tinypic.com/8foy68l.gif"; $mods_icon = "http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/3287/moddws8.gif"; $high_mods_icon = "http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/3287/moddws8.gif"; $donators_icon = "http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/5434/donnf7.gif"; // BBCODE $webbers_code = ' '; $webbers2_code = ''; $admins_code = ' '; $admins2_code = ''; $mods_code = ' '; $mods2_code = ''; $high_mods_code = ' '; $high_mods2_code = ''; $donators_code = ' '; $donators2_code = ''; ?>[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2009, 01:10:40 pm[/size][hr]ok i made it so now the only error is

Warning: mysql_result(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\config.php on line 178 Table 'highscores.skillsoverall' doesn't exist

Read full topic

item.title: Artificial?

Doesn’t tell you anything at all, or even where to take your first step?

item.title: Artificial?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

TUTORIAL - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html

Hey, i have been trying to make highscores from the tutorial but i get this error…

Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’ (using password: YES) in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\mysql.php on line 3

Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’ (using password: YES) in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\mysql.php on line 3

Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’ (using password: YES) in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\mysql.php on line 3
Overall Hiscores

Warning: mysql_result(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in C:\xampp\htdocs\highscores\Upload\config.php on line 178
No database selected

any ideas? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2009, 12:58:43 pm[/size][hr]and also, if u dont know the error, do you know how i could make the highscores myself and update the stats myself through character stats?
